001package andesite.handler;
002
003import io.vertx.core.http.ServerWebSocket;
004
005import javax.annotation.CheckReturnValue;
006import javax.annotation.Nonnull;
007import javax.annotation.Nullable;
008
009public interface WebSocketState {
010    /**
011     * The user id of this socket. This is a default value and may be overriden
012     * per-payload.
013     *
014     * @return The user id.
015     */
016    @Nonnull
017    @CheckReturnValue
018    String user();
019    
020    /**
021     * The websocket connection. Can be used to send payloads to clients. All sent payloads
022     * sent must be valid json objects.
023     *
024     * @return The websocket connection.
025     */
026    @Nonnull
027    @CheckReturnValue
028    ServerWebSocket ws();
029    
030    /**
031     * The id of this connection. Used for resuming.
032     *
033     * @return The id of this connection.
034     */
035    @Nonnull
036    @CheckReturnValue
037    String connectionId();
038    
039    /**
040     * Whether or not this connection is lavalink compatible.
041     *
042     * <br>Lavalink resumes are not supported.
043     *
044     * @return Whether or not this connection is lavalink compatible.
045     */
046    @CheckReturnValue
047    boolean lavalink();
048    
049    /**
050     * Gets a value stored in this connection. Similar to ThreadLocal but on
051     * a connection scope.
052     *
053     * <br>If no value is stored, the {@link Key#defaultValue() default} is returned.
054     *
055     * @param key Key to lookup.
056     * @param <T> Type of the object stored.
057     *
058     * @return The value stored. May be null.
059     */
060    @CheckReturnValue
061    <T> T get(@Nonnull Key<T> key);
062    
063    /**
064     * Stores a value in this connection. Similar to ThreadLocal but on
065     * a connection scope.
066     *
067     * @param key   Key to store.
068     * @param value Value to store.
069     * @param <T>   Type of object to store.
070     *
071     * @return The old value. May be null.
072     */
073    @Nullable
074    <T> T set(@Nonnull Key<T> key, @Nullable T value);
075    
076    /**
077     * Key used for connection storage. Equality is implemented as identity equality.
078     *
079     * <br>A key is only equal to itself.
080     *
081     * @param <T> Type of object to store.
082     */
083    final class Key<T> {
084        private final T defaultValue;
085        
086        public Key(@Nullable T defaultValue) {
087            this.defaultValue = defaultValue;
088        }
089        
090        /**
091         * The default value for this key.
092         *
093         * @return The default value for this key. May be null.
094         */
095        @CheckReturnValue
096        public T defaultValue() {
097            return defaultValue;
098        }
099    }
100}
